值得推荐小伙伴们一起玩儿的一个游戏，现在价格也不是很贵。枪的手感上跟原先玩儿的cs还是有差别的，刚接触有些不太适应，需要时间练练枪法。地图个人感觉很丰富了，有几个地图效果做的也很不错。几种模式轮换着玩儿也不会觉得枯燥。本人萌新一个休闲模式练枪中…最后提醒要入坑的小伙伴们：开箱莫上头！！！

I don't know what to write so I'm giving you waffles recipe:
2 eggs
2 cups all-purpose flour
1 3/4 cups milk
1/2 cup vegetable oil
1 tablespoon white sugar
4 teaspoons baking powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
Directions:
Preheat waffle iron. Beat eggs in large bowl with hand beater until fluffy. Beat in flour, milk, vegetable oil, sugar, baking powder, salt and vanilla, just until smooth.
Spray preheated waffle iron with non-stick cooking spray. Pour mix onto hot waffle iron. Cook until golden brown. Serve hot.
